item.DESCRIPT: Tabella di bufferizzazione delle conferme di produzione

item.TYPESRC: BEGIN OF ty_s_sel, p_tp_n TYPE zpp_bufconf_nest-tipo_record, "Nesting manuale p_tp_w TYPE zpp_bufconf_nest-tipo_record, "Nesting Wicam s_n_nest TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-n_nesting, "Conferma s_vornr TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-n_vornr, "Operazione s_event TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-event, "Evento s_budat TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-budat, "Data conferma s_isdd TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-isdd, "Tempo s_isdz TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-isdz, "Ora s_iedd TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-iedd, "Teempo s_iedz TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-iedz, "Tempo s_wausw TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-wausw, "Badge s_pernr TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-pernr, "CID s_utente TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-utente, "Utente s_data TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-data, "Data creazione s_ora TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-ora, "Ora creazione s_cdl TYPE RANGE OF ztpp_nesting-cdl, "Centro di lavoro s_elab TYPE RANGE OF zpp_bufconf_nest-elaborato, "Record elaborato p_layout TYPE disvariant-variant, "Layout alv END OF ty_s_sel

ALV_SHOW.item: DATA lo_alv TYPE REF TO cl_salv_table.
DATA lo_display TYPE REF TO cl_salv_display_settings.
DATA: lr_columns TYPE REF TO cl_salv_columns_list,
LOOP AT lt_fcat INTO DATA(ls_fcat) WHERE fieldname = 'BUDAT' OR
DATA: lo_functions TYPE REF TO cl_salv_functions_list,
DATA: lo_columns TYPE REF TO cl_salv_columns_table,
* DATA: lo_column TYPE REF TO cl_salv_column.

CREATE_SELECTIONS.item: DATA: lref_sel TYPE REF TO data.

DELETE.item: READ TABLE gt_alv INTO ls_alv INDEX ls_row.
READ TABLE gt_data INTO ls_data WITH KEY n_nesting = ls_alv-
* MODIFY gt_alv FROM ls_alv INDEX lv_tabix_1.

EXECUTE.item: get_data( EXPORTING is_sel = gs_sel CHANGING ct_data = gt_data ).

GET_DATA.item: SELECT * INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE gt_data FROM zpp_bufconf
SORT gt_data BY n_nesting tipo_record n_vornr progr.
SELECT SINGLE * INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF ls_ztpp_nesting FROM
MODIFY gt_alv FROM ls_alv INDEX lv_tabix TRANSPORTING cdl.

SAVE.item: READ TABLE gt_alv INTO ls_alv INDEX ls_row.
LOOP AT gt_alv INTO ls_alv WHERE ligth = icon_yellow_light
MODIFY gt_alv FROM ls_alv INDEX lv_tabix.

TRANSF_NEST_TO_PROD.item: DATA: lt_bufconf_nest TYPE TABLE OF zpp_bufconf_nest,
READ TABLE gt_alv INTO ls_alv INDEX ls_row.
LOOP AT gt_alv INTO ls_alv WHERE ligth = icon_yellow_light
LOOP AT gt_data INTO DATA(ls_data_2) WHERE n_nesting = ls_d
MODIFY gt_alv FROM ls_alv INDEX ls_row.
MESSAGE i398(00) WITH 'Selezionare almeno un evento B40'(022).

FORZ_CHIUSURA.item: DATA: lt_bufconf_nest TYPE TABLE OF zpp_bufconf_nest,
READ TABLE gt_alv INTO ls_alv INDEX ls_row.
INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE lt_bufconf_nest
